attributes.action: Offer dairy free options in meal deal offers at supermarkets
attributes.additional_details: To be more inclusive for those with allergies, dietary requirements and preference. My daughter is limited for choices in a meal deal because a simple change stands in her way. Swapping to a spread in sandwiches that is more inclusive can open more options for people like my daughter who have a milk allergy. Adding dairy free chocolate bars or other snacks in with the snack option can make meal deals more inclusive for her and others.
attributes.background: Adding dairy free chocolate bars to the 'snacks' options of meal deals, swapping the butter spread used in sandwiches for a dairy free option making more sandwiches accessible for dairy free users, adding more dairy free options to make it more inclusive for those with allergies and dietary needs.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to include in meal deals are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
